title: "CNAS Responds: CHIPS and Science Act Signed Into Law"
excerpt: "The real meat of the bill, however, is the focus on research and innovation across the spectrum of science and technology (S&T). The CHIPS and Science Act authorizes the largest five-year investment in public R&D in American history–nearly $170 billion in key programs–from AI to 6G telecommunications to energy storage."
